title: Firefox search bug in OS Sequoia
content: Updated to OS Sequoia. When performing search in Address Bar in Firefox before update (previous OS editions), pressing "Control, Return" automatically added the .com to the address and went directly to the site requested. Since updating to OS Sequoia, performing the same task, it will still take the user directly to the .com address, but now shows the following illustrated in the attached file. This does not occur when using Safari or Opera. Did the OS Sequoia update break something?
creator: gwvwadc

title: Impossibile stabilire una connessione con il server proxy
content:
è da giorni che sto provando ad utilizzare firefox ma non funziona, mi compare sempre la schermata: "Impossibile stabilire una connessione con il server proxy

Firefox è configurato per utilizzare un server proxy che non risulta raggiungibile. 

   Verificare la correttezza delle impostazioni del proxy.    Verificare se il computer ha una connessione di rete funzionante.    Se il computer o la rete sono protetti da un firewall o un proxy, assicurarsi che Firefox abbia i permessi per accedere al Web."

Non ho toccato nulla e non so cosa fare, vi prego aiutatemi
creator: mattia.zerbonia00

creator: Alan_King

title: Sync deleting extensions from old devices instead of installing to new ones
content:
I had to reinstall Firefox on laptop B. Initially I copied the profile folder back, as I had a recent backup. However, when I sync'd, it deleted a bunch of extensions - which then sync'd and deleted them from laptop A too.

I got them back (manually) on A, deleted the new installation on B, then reinstalled and resync'd (without copying the profile folder). Same thing happened, except as I wasn't coming from the profile, I'd also lost a bunch of settings. So even worse.

My theory (based on the popup about syncing with a mobile device) is it is, for some reason, syncing with my Android phone config (which doesn't have all the same extensions, as they're not compatible) instead of my browser on A.

Has anyone else encountered this? Any solutions?
creator: jamesdeluk

title: Support Forum Improvement Suggestions
content:
I can't find a topic area for this - I assume the mods will move it or delete it as appropriate.

These are suggestions for improvements to this forum, where I'm pretty new.

1. When I ask a question that doesn't give me answers I want I get to hit the "Continue" button in the "Still need help..." box, only to be presented with an empty question line. It would be helpful if my original question were copied across.

2. It would be helpful if questions and last answer were dated in the results list. It's a bit annoying to click on an answer only to find that it's from so long ago that it's irrelevant.

Thanks.
creator: mnbvdtx7z9

title: Set System Dialog as Default on Mac
content:
Is there a way to force Firefox to print using the system dialogue?

I've tried setting print.tab_modal.enabled and app.normandy.startupRolloutPrefs.print.tab_modal.enabled to false and print.prefer_system_dialog to true but I still get the Firefox pop-up for printing.

The reason I don't want the Firefox print is that it doesn't let me open pdfs in Preview and it is missing most of the printer settings that I use on a daily basis.


Thanks in advance for any help.
creator: mnbvdtx7z9

title: Very frustrated with browser closing and not saving my tabs
content: Very frustrated with browser closing and not saving my tabs. Just got a brand new laptop and had everything set up but when I shut down system overnight, this morning I booted up and nothing was saved in Firefox!!!! HOURS of work wasted. So I again spent all morning doing it all again. Just now -- my browser closed automatically in the middle of work I was doing and everything disappeared again. I have been a LOYAL user of Firefox for years but I'm not doing this again. I despise all other options but need urgent help NOW to guide me through. Is it this Private Browsing? thing that showed up I didn't choose? How do I get rid of it? I'm a novice online but can be taught. Waste of my life and time....
creator: joy4thejourney

title: Getting Error code: PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR
content:

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to yts.mx. PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR

Error code: PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR
